column1: Figure 2. Percent of persons age 12 or older who were victims of violent crime and violent crime excluding simple assault, 1993–2022
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Crime Victimization Survey, 1993–2022
Authors: Alexandra Thompson and Susannah N. Tapp, PhD, BJS Statisticians
Figure 2. Percent of persons age 12 or older who were victims of violent crime and violent crime excluding simple assault, 1993–2022

Note: See table 1 for definitions and appendix table 15 for estimates, standard errors, and 95% confidence intervals. Estimates for 2006 should not be compared to other years. See Criminal Victimization, 2007 (NCJ 224390, BJS, December 2008) for information on changes to the 2006 National Crime Victimization Survey.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Crime Victimization Survey, 1993–2022.
